name: SDS011
desc: For : Particulate matters concentration Informations : Uses a laser to reads the concentration of particulate matter in the air. Makes some noise as the fan used is rather large.

name: DHT22
desc: For : Temperature, humidity Informations : Uses a capacitive humidity sensor and a thermistor to measure the surrounding air. Readings every 2 seconds.

name: MQ-2
desc: For : Combustible Gases - Methane, Butane, LPG, smoke Informations :  Standard gas concentration sensor, conductivity of the sensor depends on the concentration of target gases in the air.
